amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding in the bill by one percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce the funding in the bill by 1% across the board.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hefley amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 87 - 326 (Roll no. 481).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Hefley.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
